p: The effects of extracts on the protection of supercoiled DNA were studied against OH radical in a model system named plasmid relaxation assay ( Russo et al., 2006). Briefly, plasmid pUC19 was isolated from E. coli XL1-blue ( Birnboim, 1983) and was checked after 1 h electrophoresis on 1% agarose gel (0.5 × TBE, 80 V, 300 mA). About 80% of the isolated plasmid was present in the closed circular form, while about 20% was in the open circular (nicked) form.
